entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
